Truk Terguling di Km 38 Tol Merak, Lalin Sedikit Tersendat
07 Nov 2019, 23:45 by Matius Alfons
Jakarta - Satu truk terguling di Km 38+400 Jalan Tol Balaraja arah Merak. Lalu lintas di Jalan Tol Merak ini sedikit tersendat.
Peristiwa truk terguling ini terjadi sekitar pukul 22.50 WIB. Saat ini truk tersebut sudah dalam penanganan petugas.
"Iya betul ada truk terguling di Km 38 Balaraja arah Merak. Ini informasi yang kami dapat sudah dalam penangan petugas," kata petugas call center NTMC Polri, Singgih, saat dihubungi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Berdasarkan informasi, kondisi lalu lintas di jalan tol saat ini ramai cenderung lancar. Lalu lintas di jalan tol sedikit tersendat di sekitar lokasi kejadian.
"Di lokasi ini ramai cenderung lancar, jadi hanya tersendat sedikit," ucap Singgih.
Hingga kini belum ada informasi terkait penyebab kecelakaan ini. Korban kecelakaan juga belum diketahui.

Tumbling Truck at Km 38 of Merak Toll Road, Lalin Slackened
Nov. 7, 2019, 11:45 p.m. by Matthew Alfons
Jakarta - One truck overturned at Km 38 + 400 Balaraja Toll Road in the direction of Merak. The traffic on the Merak Toll Road is a little choked up.
The overturned truck incident occurred at around 22.50 West Indonesia Time. At present the truck is in the handling of officers.
"Yes, it is true that there was a truck overturned at Km 38 Balaraja in the direction of Merak. This is information that we got in the hands of officers," said the NTMC Polri call center officer, Singgih, when contacted on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Based on information, the current traffic conditions on the toll roads tend to be smooth. Traffic on the highway was a little choked up around the scene.
"In this busy location tends to be smooth, so only a little choked up," said Singgih.
Until now there has been no information related to the cause of this accident. Accident victims are also unknown.
